Buff.Name: Party Speed Buff
Buff.Description: Provides a speed boost of 2 units for the cost of 5 magicka per hour.

Buff.Name: Extra Party Speed Buff
Buff.Description: Provides a speed boost of 3 units for the cost of 5 magicka per hour.

Buff.Name: Mad Party Speed Buff
Buff.Description: Provides a speed boost of 4 units for the cost of 5 magicka per hour.
